context.apps.demos.accelerometer
Class AccelerometerDataConverter

java.lang.Object
  context.apps.demos.accelerometer.AccelerometerDataConverter

public class AccelerometerDataConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Original Hashtable storage is of the model; counts of attributes at certain values. These counts can be used to derive probabilities required for the Naive Bayes calculations. This class reconstitutes instance data so that I can create ARFF files to be used specifically for the Weka implementation of Naive Bayes.
